process.name: SoilTemperature_process
process.description: Crankâ€“Nicolson soil heat transport with sub-daily boundary-layer exchange and net radiation, updating soil temperature profile and daily min/max/mean.

inputs.name: physical_Thickness
inputs.description: Soil layer thickness by layer

inputs.name: physical_BD
inputs.description: Bulk density by layer

inputs.name: physical_Rocks
inputs.description: Rock fragment content by layer (percent)

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeSand
inputs.description: Sand fraction by layer (percent of mineral)

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeSilt
inputs.description: Silt fraction by layer (percent of mineral)

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeClay
inputs.description: Clay fraction by layer (percent of mineral)

inputs.name: organic_Carbon
inputs.description: Organic carbon by layer (percent)

inputs.name: waterBalance_SW
inputs.description: Volumetric soil water content by layer

inputs.name: weather_Tav
inputs.description: Mean temperature used for initial seasonal soil temperature

inputs.name: weather_Amp
inputs.description: Annual temperature amplitude used for initial seasonal soil temperature

inputs.name: weather_Latitude
inputs.description: Latitude

inputs.name: clock_Today_DayOfYear
inputs.description: Current day of year

inputs.name: DepthToConstantTemperature
inputs.description: Depth to constant temperature boundary used to create phantom nodes

inputs.name: instrumentHeight_input
inputs.description: Initial instrument/reference height above surface (used to set instrumentHeight)

inputs.name: defaultTimeOfMaximumTemperature
inputs.description: Hour of day for maximum air temperature used in diurnal interpolation

inputs.name: boundarLayerConductanceSource
inputs.description: Boundary-layer conductance source: 'calc' or 'constant'

inputs.name: netRadiationSource
inputs.description: Net radiation source: 'calc' or alternative

inputs.name: InitialValues
inputs.description: Optional initial soil temperature values by layer (topsoil downward)

inputs.name: weather_MeanT
inputs.description: Daily mean air temperature

inputs.name: weather_MaxT
inputs.description: Daily maximum air temperature

inputs.name: weather_MinT
inputs.description: Daily minimum air temperature

inputs.name: weather_Radn
inputs.description: Daily solar radiation

inputs.name: weather_AirPressure
inputs.description: Air pressure

inputs.name: weather_Wind
inputs.description: Wind speed at instrument height

inputs.name: microClimate_CanopyHeight
inputs.description: Canopy height

inputs.name: waterBalance_Eos
inputs.description: Soil evaporation (used in energy balance and emissivity scaling)

inputs.name: waterBalance_Eo
inputs.description: Potential evaporation (used for radiation penetration scaling)

inputs.name: waterBalance_Es
inputs.description: Actual soil evaporation (used for latent heat flux)

inputs.name: waterBalance_Salb
inputs.description: Soil albedo (shortwave reflectance)

inputs.name: doInitialisationStuff
inputs.description: Flag to run one-time initialisation inside process

inputs.name: internalTimeStep
inputs.description: Internal sub-daily timestep in seconds

inputs.name: timeOfDaySecs
inputs.description: Current time within day in seconds for sub-daily loop

inputs.name: numNodes
inputs.description: Number of computational nodes (layers + phantom nodes + surface/air nodes accounted in arrays)

inputs.name: numLayers
inputs.description: Number of soil layers in the physical profile

inputs.name: nodeDepth
inputs.description: Node depths (m) including air and phantom nodes

inputs.name: thermCondPar1
inputs.description: Thermal conductivity parameter 1 by node (Coefficients from bulk density and clay)

inputs.name: thermCondPar2
inputs.description: Thermal conductivity parameter 2 by node (from bulk density)

inputs.name: thermCondPar3
inputs.description: Thermal conductivity parameter 3 by node (from clay content)

inputs.name: thermCondPar4
inputs.description: Thermal conductivity parameter 4 by node (from bulk density)

inputs.name: volSpecHeatSoil
inputs.description: Volumetric specific heat of soil at nodes

inputs.name: soilTemp
inputs.description: Soil temperature at nodes (including air and phantom nodes)

inputs.name: morningSoilTemp
inputs.description: Soil temperature snapshot at ~5 AM for each node

inputs.name: heatStorage
inputs.description: Heat storage term by node (unused persistent container)

inputs.name: thermalConductance
inputs.description: Thermal conductance between nodes (unused persistent container)

inputs.name: thermalConductivity
inputs.description: Thermal conductivity at nodes (includes boundary layer at air node)

inputs.name: boundaryLayerConductance
inputs.description: Daily-averaged boundary-layer conductance (air node) accumulated over sub-steps

inputs.name: newTemperature
inputs.description: Working array for new temperatures during matrix solve (includes air node)

inputs.name: airTemperature
inputs.description: Instantaneous air temperature used at the air node during sub-step

inputs.name: maxTempYesterday
inputs.description: Yesterday's maximum air temperature used for diurnal interpolation pre-dawn

inputs.name: minTempYesterday
inputs.description: Yesterday's minimum air temperature used for diurnal interpolation pre-dawn

inputs.name: soilWater
inputs.description: Volumetric soil water content mapped to nodes (last layer extended to phantom)

inputs.name: minSoilTemp
inputs.description: Daily minimum soil temperature per node (reset each day)

inputs.name: maxSoilTemp
inputs.description: Daily maximum soil temperature per node (reset each day)

inputs.name: aveSoilTemp
inputs.description: Daily average soil temperature per node accumulated over sub-steps

inputs.name: thickness
inputs.description: Element thicknesses including phantom segments for heat domain (surface-aligned)

inputs.name: bulkDensity
inputs.description: Bulk density array extended to phantom nodes

inputs.name: rocks
inputs.description: Rock fraction array extended to phantom nodes (percent)

inputs.name: carbon
inputs.description: Organic carbon array extended to phantom nodes (percent)

inputs.name: sand
inputs.description: Sand fraction array extended to phantom nodes (percent)

inputs.name: silt
inputs.description: Silt fraction array extended to phantom nodes (percent)

inputs.name: clay
inputs.description: Clay fraction array extended to phantom nodes (percent)

inputs.name: soilRoughnessHeight
inputs.description: Bare soil roughness height used as a lower bound for canopy height

inputs.name: instrumentHeight
inputs.description: Instrument/reference height above surface updated to be at least canopy+0.5 m

inputs.name: netRadiation
inputs.description: Net radiation per sub-step used in surface energy balance (shortwave-dominant here)

inputs.name: canopyHeight
inputs.description: Canopy height used in boundary layer conductance (m)

inputs.name: instrumHeight
inputs.description: Raw instrument height input value stored for reference

inputs.name: nu
inputs.description: Crankâ€“Nicolson weighting parameter (0..1)

inputs.name: boundarLayerConductanceSource
inputs.description: Boundary-layer conductance option stored in state

inputs.name: netRadiationSource
inputs.description: Net radiation option stored in state

inputs.name: InitialValues
inputs.description: Stored initial soil temperature by layer (if provided)

inputs.name: defaultTimeOfMaximumTemperature
inputs.description: Stored default Tmax time used for diurnal interpolation

inputs.name: soilConstituentNames
inputs.description: List of soil constituent names used in mixture rules

inputs.name: pom
inputs.description: Particle density of organic matter used in fractions

inputs.name: ps
inputs.description: Particle density of soil minerals used in fractions

inputs.name: DepthToConstantTemperature
inputs.description: Stored constant-depth parameter used during initialise

outputs.name: doInitialisationStuff
outputs.description: Flag to run one-time initialisation inside process

outputs.name: internalTimeStep
outputs.description: Internal sub-daily timestep in seconds

outputs.name: timeOfDaySecs
outputs.description: Current time within day in seconds for sub-daily loop

outputs.name: numNodes
outputs.description: Number of computational nodes

outputs.name: numLayers
outputs.description: Number of soil layers in the physical profile

outputs.name: nodeDepth
outputs.description: Node depths (m) including air and phantom nodes

outputs.name: thermCondPar1
outputs.description: Thermal conductivity parameter 1 by node

outputs.name: thermCondPar2
outputs.description: Thermal conductivity parameter 2 by node

outputs.name: thermCondPar3
outputs.description: Thermal conductivity parameter 3 by node

outputs.name: thermCondPar4
outputs.description: Thermal conductivity parameter 4 by node

outputs.name: volSpecHeatSoil
outputs.description: Volumetric specific heat of soil at nodes

outputs.name: soilTemp
outputs.description: Soil temperature at nodes (including air and phantom nodes)

outputs.name: morningSoilTemp
outputs.description: Soil temperature snapshot at ~5 AM for each node

outputs.name: heatStorage
outputs.description: Heat storage term by node (persistent container)

outputs.name: thermalConductance
outputs.description: Thermal conductance between nodes (persistent container)

outputs.name: thermalConductivity
outputs.description: Thermal conductivity at nodes (includes boundary layer at air node)

outputs.name: boundaryLayerConductance
outputs.description: Daily-averaged boundary-layer conductance (air node)

outputs.name: newTemperature
outputs.description: Working array for new temperatures during matrix solve (includes air node)

outputs.name: airTemperature
outputs.description: Instantaneous air temperature used at the air node during sub-step

outputs.name: maxTempYesterday
outputs.description: Yesterday's maximum air temperature used for diurnal interpolation

outputs.name: minTempYesterday
outputs.description: Yesterday's minimum air temperature used for diurnal interpolation

outputs.name: soilWater
outputs.description: Volumetric soil water content mapped to nodes (last layer extended to phantom)

outputs.name: minSoilTemp
outputs.description: Daily minimum soil temperature per node

outputs.name: maxSoilTemp
outputs.description: Daily maximum soil temperature per node

outputs.name: aveSoilTemp
outputs.description: Daily average soil temperature per node

outputs.name: thickness
outputs.description: Element thicknesses including phantom segments for heat domain

outputs.name: bulkDensity
outputs.description: Bulk density array extended to phantom nodes

outputs.name: rocks
outputs.description: Rock fraction array extended to phantom nodes (percent)

outputs.name: carbon
outputs.description: Organic carbon array extended to phantom nodes (percent)

outputs.name: sand
outputs.description: Sand fraction array extended to phantom nodes (percent)

outputs.name: silt
outputs.description: Silt fraction array extended to phantom nodes (percent)

outputs.name: clay
outputs.description: Clay fraction array extended to phantom nodes (percent)

outputs.name: soilRoughnessHeight
outputs.description: Bare soil roughness height used as a lower bound for canopy height

outputs.name: instrumentHeight
outputs.description: Instrument/reference height above surface updated to be at least canopy+0.5 m

outputs.name: netRadiation
outputs.description: Net radiation per sub-step used in surface energy balance (shortwave-dominant here)

outputs.name: canopyHeight
outputs.description: Canopy height used in boundary layer conductance (m)

outputs.name: instrumHeight
outputs.description: Raw instrument height input value stored for reference

outputs.name: nu
outputs.description: Crankâ€“Nicolson weighting parameter (0..1)

outputs.name: boundarLayerConductanceSource
outputs.description: Boundary-layer conductance option stored in state

outputs.name: netRadiationSource
outputs.description: Net radiation option stored in state

outputs.name: InitialValues
outputs.description: Stored initial soil temperature by layer (if provided)

outputs.name: defaultTimeOfMaximumTemperature
outputs.description: Stored default Tmax time used for diurnal interpolation

outputs.name: soilConstituentNames
outputs.description: List of soil constituent names used in mixture rules

outputs.name: pom
outputs.description: Particle density of organic matter used in fractions

outputs.name: ps
outputs.description: Particle density of soil minerals used in fractions

outputs.name: DepthToConstantTemperature
outputs.description: Stored constant-depth parameter used during initialise

functions.name: Divide
functions.description: Safe division returning a fallback value on zero denominator.

functions.name: ValuesInArray
functions.description: Checks if an array contains any valid (non-999999, non-NaN) value.

functions.name: Sum
functions.description: Sums values between indices ignoring 999999 sentinel.

functions.name: Zero
functions.description: Sets all entries of an array to zero.

functions.name: ToCumThickness
functions.description: Computes cumulative thickness.

functions.name: volumetricSpecificHeat
functions.description: Returns specific heat capacity for a named soil constituent.

functions.name: ThermalConductance
functions.description: Returns conductance value for a constituent (quirk: returns specific heat).

functions.name: shapeFactor
functions.description: Returns shape factor for heat transport (quirk: returns specific heat).

functions.name: airDensity
functions.description: Computes air density from temperature and pressure.

functions.name: doThermalConductivityCoeffs
functions.description: Computes empirical coefficients for thermal conductivity.

functions.name: doVolumetricSpecificHeat
functions.description: Aggregates volumetric specific heat at nodes from constituents.

functions.name: doThermalConductivity
functions.description: Computes effective thermal conductivity at nodes via mixture rules.

functions.name: mapLayer2Node
functions.description: Maps layer-centered values to node-centered values by linear weighting.

functions.name: doThomas
functions.description: Thomas algorithm solve for tridiagonal system (Crankâ€“Nicolson step).

functions.name: interpolateTemperature
functions.description: Diurnal air temperature interpolation using sinusoidal method.

functions.name: doUpdate
functions.description: Updates temperatures and daily min/max/mean; averages boundary layer conductance.

functions.name: getBoundaryLayerConductance
functions.description: Computes boundary-layer conductance with stability corrections.

functions.name: kelvinT
functions.description: Converts Celsius to Kelvin.

functions.name: longWaveRadn
functions.description: Computes longwave radiation for given emissivity and temperature.

functions.name: calcSoilTemperature
functions.description: Initial seasonal soil temperature profile from harmonic solution.

functions.name: calcLayerTemperature
functions.description: Harmonic temperature at depth with phase lag and damping.

functions.name: calcSurfaceTemperature
functions.description: Estimates soil surface temperature from albedo, air T, and radiation.

functions.name: doNetRadiation
functions.description: Distributes daily shortwave across sub-steps; estimates cloud fraction.

functions.name: interpolateNetRadiation
functions.description: Computes net radiation per sub-step for soil surface.

functions.name: math_pi
functions.description: Returns mathematical constant pi.

functions.name: math_sin
functions.description: Sine wrapper.

functions.name: math_cos
functions.description: Cosine wrapper.

functions.name: math_exp
functions.description: Exponential wrapper.

functions.name: math_log
functions.description: Natural log wrapper.

functions.name: math_sqrt
functions.description: Square root wrapper.
